mapper.select: select p.no as no, p.title as title, p.content as content, p.reg_date as regDate, p.category_no as categoryNo from (category c join user u on c.user_no = u.no) join post p on c.no = p.CATEGORY_NO where id=#{id} order by p.reg_date desc

select p.no as no, p.title as title, p.content as content, p.reg_date as regDate, p.category_no as categoryNo from category c join post p on c.no = p.category_no where p.category_no = #{categoryNo} order by p.reg_date desc
select no, title, content, reg_date as regDate, category_no as categoryNo from post where no = #{no}
select ifnull(max(p.no), 0) as no from (post p join category c on p.category_no = c.no) join user u on c.user_no = u.no where u.id = #{id} order by p.reg_date desc limit 1
